c74object.name: j.namespace_selector
c74object.digest: A gui interface for namespace selection
c74object.description: j.namespace_selector is a simple j.namespace-based gui used in cue_manager model to manually select addresses in Jamoma namespace

objarg.name: namespace name
objarg.description: j.namespace_selector can have an argument defining a name for the namespace selection

objarg.name: root address
objarg.description: j.namespace_selector can have asecond argument defining a root address to select address from
